name: Girl With Rainbow Tears
description: A spray piece, inspired by love. Introducing the crying girl. Her tears of colour are brought by joy - they were given to her by the rainbow gods when she was born. Wherever she goes, she transforms the tears of others into rainbow droplets. Their translucent tears turn to colour and dissolve bad moments, amplify good memories and bring abundance to all. Collect this piece to share the magical power of the crying girl.
